answers.answer: ALL the above. Your brother needs to see a doctor, test for diabetes, an EKG, and Thallium Stress (myocardial) test to determine extent of coronary artery blockage. Then see a dietician/nutritionist to get him on a path of healthy eating.

question: my brother is 32, he is over weight, doesnt exercise, no job, drinks alot of pop and eats a lot of un healthy food. my question is what would cause him to fall asleep like 5-10 minutes after he eats a meal. Could it be diabeties or is it something else? diabetites runs in our family.
title: sleeping after eating
